mapper.select: select * from (select CREW_NUM, BOARD_NUM, BOARD_SUBJECT, BOARD_CONTENT, REGEXP_SUBSTR(board_content, '<img.*?">') as BOARD_IMG, REGEXP_REPLACE(BOARD_CONTENT, '<[^>]*>|\&([^;])*;', '') as BOARD_TEXT, BOARD_VIEW, BOARD_GOOD, BOARD_REPLY, (BOARD_VIEW+BOARD_GOOD+BOARD_REPLY) as popular_count, ROW_NUMBER() over (order by (BOARD_VIEW+BOARD_GOOD+BOARD_REPLY) desc) as board_rank from BOARD order by BOARD_VIEW desc, BOARD_GOOD desc ,BOARD_REPLY desc) where board_rank<5

select B.* , NVL(F.BOARD_FILE_COUNT,0) BOARD_FILE_COUNT from BOARD B LEFT OUTER JOIN (select BOARD_NUM , COUNT(*) BOARD_FILE_COUNT from BOARD_FILE where BOARD_FILE_STATUS = 0 group by BOARD_NUM) F on B.BOARD_NUM=F.BOARD_NUM
select b.* , c.* from BOARD b join CREW c on b.CREW_NUM=c.CREW_NUM where c.SHIP_NUM=#{shipNum} and board_subject like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'

select B.board_num , C.* from board B LEFT OUTER JOIN (select crew_num , crew_nickname from crew C where ship_num=#{shipNum}) C on B.CREW_NUM=C.CREW_NUM where C.CREW_NICKNAME like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'

select B.board_num , C.* from board B LEFT OUTER JOIN (select crew_num , crew_nickname from crew C where ship_num=#{shipNum}) C on B.CREW_NUM=C.CREW_NUM where B.BOARD_SUBJECT like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'

select B.board_num , C.* from board B LEFT OUTER JOIN (select crew_num , crew_nickname from crew C where ship_num=#{shipNum}) C on B.CREW_NUM=C.CREW_NUM where B.BOARD_CONTENT like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'

select B.board_num , C.* from board B LEFT OUTER JOIN (select crew_num , crew_nickname from crew C where ship_num=#{shipNum}) C on B.CREW_NUM=C.CREW_NUM where B.BOARD_CONTENT like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or B.BOARD_SUBJECT like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or C.CREW_NICKNAME like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'

select * from (SELECT board_num, LAG(board_num) OVER (ORDER BY board_num) preBoardNum, LEAD(board_num) OVER (ORDER BY board_num) nextBoardNum FROM (select board_num from board where crew_num in (select crew_num from crew where ship_num=#{shipNum}) order by board_wdate desc) ORDER BY board_num ) B where B.board_num=#{boardNum}

select C.* , NVL(F.BOARD_FILE_COUNT,0) boardFileCount from (select B.* , C.CREW_NICKNAME , C.CREW_PHOTO from BOARD B join CREW C on B.CREW_NUM=C.CREW_NUM where C.SHIP_NUM=#{shipNum} order by B.BUNDLE_NUM DESC) C LEFT OUTER JOIN (select BOARD_NUM , COUNT(*) BOARD_FILE_COUNT from BOARD_FILE where BOARD_FILE_STATUS = 0 group by BOARD_NUM) F on C.BOARD_NUM=F.BOARD_NUM

select C.* , NVL(F.BOARD_FILE_COUNT,0) boardFileCount from (select B.* , C.CREW_NICKNAME , C.CREW_PHOTO from BOARD B join CREW C on B.CREW_NUM=C.CREW_NUM where C.SHIP_NUM=#{shipNum} ) C LEFT OUTER JOIN (select BOARD_NUM , COUNT(*) BOARD_FILE_COUNT from BOARD_FILE where BOARD_FILE_STATUS = 0 group by BOARD_NUM) F on C.BOARD_NUM=F.BOARD_NUM order by ${keyword} DESC
mapper.update: update BOARD set BOARD_REPLY=BOARD_REPLY+1 where BOARD_NUM=#{boardNum}
update BOARD set BOARD_GOOD=BOARD_GOOD+1 where BOARD_NUM=#{boardNum}
update BOARD set BOARD_VIEW=BOARD_VIEW+1 where BOARD_NUM=#{boardNum}
update BOARD set BOARD_GOOD = #{count} where BOARD_NUM=#{boardNum}
update BOARD set BOARD_REPLY = #{count} where BOARD_NUM=#{boardNum}
mapper.select: select B.* ,C.CREW_PHOTO, C.CREW_NICKNAME from BOARD B join CREW C on B.CREW_NUM=C.CREW_NUM where B.BOARD_NUM=#{boardNum}
